## Modified Mazda MPG Predictor

To be able to estimate or predict your modified Mazda Race car MPG you can use this tool.
The tool was developed using mtcars test data and is using a cariety of cars data.

To use our tool please follow these steps:

1. Launch application.
2. Use the HP slider to set your final power in HP.
3. Use the Weight slider to set the final weight in pounds.
4. Press the submit button.

You can repert above steps any numbet of time to optimize your fuel consumption.
